author: Steve Morris
title: Can anyone recommend any websites for long term rentals?
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Goa » Can anyone recommend any websites for long term rentals? Can anyone recommend any websites for long term rentals? I am looking at renting an apartment in either Candolim, or the south around Palolem. The only sites I find when searching are for daily rates. Can anyone recommend any good sites so I can do some research... Thanks
